right-mediainfo-term:
{{doc-right|mediainfo-term}}
Right to alter the [[d:Special:MyLanguage/Wikidata:Glossary#Term|terms]] of [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#media info|media info]] entities.
wikibase-entity-mediainfo: How we refer to entities of type media info. See also the Wikidata glossary on [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#media info|media info]].
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-ad: {{wikibase summary messages|entity|Automatic edit summary generated when creating a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Added [en] caption: A cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-re: {{wikibase summary messages|entity|Automatic edit summary generated when removing a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example edit summary is "Removed [en] label".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-se: {{wikibase summary messages|entity|Automatic edit summary generated when editing an file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Updated [en] caption: A domestic cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibasemediainfo-entitytermsforlanguage:
List of labels, aliases and descriptions in one or more languages: Heading of the "caption" column.
{{Identical|Caption}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-structured-da: Label for the 'Structured data' section of the File page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-more-language:
Text for link for expanding structured data to see more languages. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of languages, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-fewer-languag: Text for link for collapsing structured data to see fewer languages
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-add-caption: Text for link for adding a caption
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit-captions: Label text for edit captions icon
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel: Label for 'cancel' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-publish: Label for 'publish' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-empty: Text to display when a caption is missing for a language
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-too-l:
Error text for when a caption is too long. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters over maximum, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-appro:
Warning text when a caption is approaching the length limit. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters left before reaching max character count, for PLURAL support
